meanings.definition: The process or result of working out or developing something.
meanings.sent1: The outworking of the plan took longer than expected.
meanings.sent2: Her outworking of the project impressed everyone.
meanings.sent3: The outworking of the puzzle left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent4: The outworking of the problem revealed a hidden solution.
meanings.sent5: The outworking of the design was intricate and beautiful.

meanings.definition: The act of bringing something to completion or fruition.
meanings.sent1: The outworking of the event was a success.
meanings.sent2: His outworking of the idea led to great achievements.
meanings.sent3: The outworking of the cake left everyone satisfied.
meanings.sent4: The outworking of the play brought tears to the audience's eyes.
meanings.sent5: The outworking of the dream finally came true.
